dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR10 consists of 60,000 color images each with a resolution of 32 × 32, divided into 10 different classes. The training set contains 50,000 images, while the validation set has 10,000 images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR100 is a more difficult dataset similar to CIFAR10, consisting of color images each with a resolution of 32 × 32, but divided into 100 different classes. The training set contains 500 examples per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: VOC2012 is a publicly available dataset used for detection, classification, and semantic segmentation. It contains 20 different classes and provides annotations for semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: VOC2012
